name: Wooseok Kim
introduce:
I'm a developer with a passion for history, UX, and automation.
Focuses on user-centered design and intuitive interface implementation and optimization because I believe in giving users the best experience possible.
Deployments include working with domains and SSL environments using Nginx in a Linux cloud environment.
Along the way, you can write automated deployment scripts via Github actions, and you have experience building cyclical software via cron-tabs.
